title: Dockerize MCP server with persistent volumes
description: Create Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml to run the MCP server in a container. Mount vector_store and api_specs directories as volumes for persistence. This provides an easier way to manage the server lifecycle (start/stop/restart) without background processes. Include health checks and proper logging configuration.
close_reason: Implemented Docker containerization with docker-compose. Created Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, and .dockerignore. Added persistent volume mounts for vector_store and api_specs. Included health checks, auto-restart, and logging. Updated README with Docker usage instructions. Server tested and working in container on port 8888.
